home.welcome: Welcome to the Calimero KV Store Demo!
home.demoDescription: A powerful key-value storage application built on Calimero's P2P network. Store, retrieve, and manage your data with real-time synchronization across the network.
home.calimeroIntro: Calimero is a privacy-focused blockchain network that enables developers to build scalable, private applications. Our platform provides the infrastructure for creating decentralized applications with enhanced privacy and performance.

description.title: Welcome to the Calimero KV Store Demo
description.subtitle: A P2P key-value storage application
features: Store and retrieve key-value pairs on the Calimero P2P network
Real-time data synchronization across P2P nodes
Easy-to-use interface for managing your data
description.getStarted: Connect your wallet to get started
